code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=_ref=>{let{onSearch}=_ref;const[query,setQuery]=useState('');const handleInputChange=event=>{setQuery(event.target.value);};const handleKeyDown=event=>{if(event.key==='Enter'){onSearch(query);}};const handleSearchClick=()=>{onSearch(query);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search for a station...",value:query,onChange:handleInputChange,onKeyDown:handleKeyDown}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearchClick,children:"Search"})]});};export default SearchBar;
